title: Jamie Wallis – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jamie Wallis, the Conservative MP for Bridgend, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
This has been an incredibly tough decision. But following my calls for PM to resign on Sunday, I promised to make this decision with the country’s security and stability the only consideration – in doing so it’s clear it simply has to be Rishi Sunak.
